title: The best thing about the mordekaiser update
body:
The pentakill skins actually work as a team now,
Not quite sure why they weren't a meta team before... but anyway they are now.

replies.body: Also, since his ult is a 'debuff' and dragon is immune to debuffs why is it that mordekaiser can ult dragon...

he doesn't ult the dragon, its a passive that is ON his ult. He does nothing but damage the dragon and he will summon the ghost for free. 

If he has a ghost as it is, the dragon will replace the old ghost.
Ah ok because I was slightly confused with that.
